title: Revox Multiuser Control
summary: Easy and comfortable control of your Revox Mutliuser system.
description: Revox offers with the Multiuser system a completely new control concept for an audio system. As a user you can take your music from room to room by simply pushing your name. Your individual music plays at CD quality, fully synchronized from room to room.The Multiuser Control App offers an easy and very comfortable way to control your Audio Multiroom System by smartphone or tablet. Select your name and control the desired rooms and sources. The Multiuser Control App offers access to your favourites of the internet radio service, the music on the NAS server and also access to external audio sources. You can even party control the sources if they have been configured on the Voxnet server.
descriptionHTML:
Revox offers with the Multiuser system a completely new control concept for an audio system. As a user you can take your music from room to room by simply pushing your name. Your individual music plays at CD quality, fully synchronized from room to room.
The Multiuser Control App offers an easy and very comfortable way to control your Audio Multiroom System by smartphone or tablet. Select your name and control the desired rooms and sources.
The Multiuser Control App offers access to your favourites of the internet radio service, the music on the NAS server and also access to external audio sources. You can even party control the sources if they have been configured on the Voxnet server.
recentChanges: We are working constantly on improvements. The latest Revox app version provides you with the following minor changes.
- Improvement when reopen the app as user.
- Extended control options in the playview (Revox system software 2.2.0r10 required).
- Various minor improvement and bug fixes.
Note: Revox System software update to version 2.2.0r10 or higher is required. Please contact your Revox dealer for more information!
